title.rendered: FREE $10 Gift Card + Gottwals Book Fairs + D.C.

content.rendered:
Receive a $10 gift card FREE with every $25 gift card you buy!

Our gift card promo is our biggest event of the year. This is a great opportunity to maximize your buying dollars for Christmas gifts. Or, buy them for yourself! Gift cards are the perfect choice because they allow your loved ones to pick their own presents. Who wouldn’t love the opportunity to pick out books and toys at Gottwals Books?

Gottwals Book Fairs

We are currently at Huntington Middle School with our Gottwals Book Fairs! Please contact us at 478.302.5041 if you’re interested in holding an in-school OR an in-store book fair. We give up to 20-40% of total sales to your school. Our selection is really fantastic, we set up and help tear down the fair, and we are quick to replenish the inventory mid-sale. We are proud to support our local schools!

Walls of Bools D.C. Progress

We are working feverishly to set up the Washington, D.C. Walls of Books® store. Have a look at the progress!

Find the Perfect Christmas Gift

Remember that we carry new books AND toys. Who knew that the used bookshop would carry so many Christmas items? We have plenty for the whole family at Gottwals Books.
